mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_job_hist.select */ SELECT job_hist_no /* job_hist_no 작업_이력_번호 numeric */ ,job_id /* job_id 작업_ID character varying(200) */ ,strt_dt /* strt_dt 시작_일자 character(8) */ ,strt_tm /* strt_tm 시작_시각 character(6) */ ,end_dt /* end_dt 종료_일자 character(8) */ ,end_tm /* end_tm 종료_시각 character(6) */ ,job_tcnt /* job_tcnt 작업_시간 numeric */ ,rslt_cd /* rslt_cd 결과_코드 character varying(20) */ ,rslt_cntn /* rslt_cntn 결과_내용 text */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tc_job_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND job_hist_no = #{jobHistNo} /* job_hist_no 작업_이력_번호 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_job_hist.insert */ INSERT INTO tc_job_hist ( job_hist_no /* job_hist_no 작업_이력_번호 numeric */
,job_id /* job_id 작업_ID character varying(200) */
,strt_dt /* strt_dt 시작_일자 character(8) */
,strt_tm /* strt_tm 시작_시각 character(6) */
,end_dt /* end_dt 종료_일자 character(8) */
,end_tm /* end_tm 종료_시각 character(6) */
,job_tcnt /* job_tcnt 작업_시간 numeric */
,rslt_cd /* rslt_cd 결과_코드 character varying(20) */
,rslt_cntn /* rslt_cntn 결과_내용 text */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{jobHistNo} /* job_hist_no 작업_이력_번호 numeric */
,#{jobId} /* job_id 작업_ID character varying(200) */
,#{strtDt} /* strt_dt 시작_일자 character(8) */
,#{strtTm} /* strt_tm 시작_시각 character(6) */
,#{endDt} /* end_dt 종료_일자 character(8) */
,#{endTm} /* end_tm 종료_시각 character(6) */
,#{jobTcnt} /* job_tcnt 작업_시간 numeric */
,#{rsltCd} /* rslt_cd 결과_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{rsltCntn} /* rslt_cntn 결과_내용 text */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tc_job_hist.update */ UPDATE tc_job_hist
,job_id = #{jobId} /* job_id 작업_ID character varying(200) */
,strt_dt = #{strtDt} /* strt_dt 시작_일자 character(8) */

,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND job_hist_no = #{jobHistNo} /* job_hist_no 작업_이력_번호 numeric */
